title: WM Drunk Driver

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Get someone drunk on Full Moon nights.

- Go on a drive on non-Full Moon nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you get someone drunk, you will roleblock and attack them.

- When you go on a drive, you may choose to attack one or two players.

- When you go on a drive and attack one player, you will clean them.

- When you go on a drive and attack two players, you may choose one target. Your second target will be chosen randomly within the players that are one or two spaces from them on the player list.

- If you go on a drive and would attack yourself as the random target, you will not die, and will instead only attack your first target, cleaning them.

- If you go on a drive and your second target is protected by something other than a heal, is being visited by an Incarcerator or Fisherman, is an alerted Veteran, or is Medusa that is stone gazing visitors, you will instead only attack your first target, cleaning them.

- You gain roleblock immunity on non-Full Moon nights.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.

desc:

*I'm a master at making bad decisions.*
